Node.Notes: This relative pronoun appears to refer to the implied letter that is written, but the word "letter" does not appear. Alternatively, the neuter gender may be used to refer to concept of "what I wrote briefly."
Because I thought the EINAI clause was S to the previous clause, this next relative clause is actually a divergence from the line of thought and so I did not subordinate it by NP-CL.

Node.FrameGloss: {A0:less than the least A2:all men A1:(as to) what (is)}
{A0:less than the least;gentiles;saints A1:(the things) which}
